title: Pertronix D500700 Flame-Thrower Module Ignitor II Replacement Billet Distributor
features: Package Dimensions: 7.62 H x 11.176 L x 7.874 W (centimetres)

description: Replacement Ignitor II module for all Flame-Thrower billet distributors. FEATURES • Delivers twice the voltage to the spark plugs, increasing horsepower, fuel economy, and spark plug life. • 2:1 improvement over points in current fall time for increased coil output. • Epoxy molding makes our module impervious to dirt, oil, grease and moisture. • Stable timing .no need for any adjustments. • Legal in all 50 states and Canada.
